metadata.name: NFT #004: Son HEUNG-MIN
metadata.description:
#004 in the New Football Trading collection. The future of football trading cards.

The winning bidder will be the sole owner of this 1-of-1, uniquely designed artwork featuring Son Heung-Min.

Year: 2021
Edition: 1/1
Infinite Loop
4:4 / 2160x2160
